install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed Malcore.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)
**Interested in CyberSecurity and CyberSafety?** Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/ckdzsm7mTs

**IMPORTANT** - Before you can use this cog, you'll need to sign up for a Malcore account, then add your API Key to your Red instance.
Learn more and sign up for Malcore [**here**](<https://go.beehive.systems/malcore>)
name: Malcore
